It's spotless clean, the staff are friendly and always helpful and the hours are perfect. Exercise classes and workshops are offered both free and also at reasonable cost. I cant recommend this gym enough!!!

Love this YMCA!!! I have loved it since I came here for college over a decade ago and now I love it even more because of the recent renovations they’ve completed. Honestly the best gym!! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a great community, workout, and AWESOME FACILITIES!! Such a gem :)

It is a great gym on its own, fantastic when you factor in the price point. If you're looking for a gym w/ bells and whistles and other services, this isn't it. What is does have is multiple weightrooms, two pools, locker room, Peloton …

This is the best gym in town. Memberships starting at $60/month or so and you get access to a great gym, pool, indoor basketball courts, decent locker rooms with a sauna and a steam room, plus great programming for all ages. Since I moved to Berkeley I’m at the Y at least 4 times a week!

showerReviews.reviewText: I had an excellent stay at this hostel! The staff were incredibly kind and welcoming. The environment was very clean and well-organized, and everything was thoughtfully taken care of. What truly surprised me was the check-in system, it was so modern and practical! Such a great experience, I will definitely be back.

I enjoyed my stay in this hostel. The rooms are kept clean, the staff was kind and helpful via text message. I stayed in the female dorm and felt very safe, especially with the lock codes. My bunk was comfortable. The lounge is a small …

I had a wonderful experience staying at this hostel! The rooms are super clean and they are always there for you if you need any kind of help. Everything is well organized and the hostel is in a beautiful location too. I would totally recommend to check this hostel out for your staying in Sf!

Hostel was immaculately maintained - clean, modern facilities, good room to bathroom ratio, good kitchen and working space. Stayed in a double bed cubicle in a room with one other cubicle, was a nicely private set up. Complimentary, …

First, the good stuff: great location, amazing price (it is SF after all), in a safe area for solo travellers, and fairly clean. Overall, I would rate my stay as okay, and it's perfectly fine for a night or two if you're trying to stick to …

Great nice clean place. I don’t know what happened but I booked through Booking.com but got charged twice 🤨 once through Booking and another from Chapter San Francisco directly. Only downside of my whole experience, still trying to figure out what’s going on. But would recommend this place, besides booking from a third party website. …

I’m not very eager to give this place a low rating because it has a good price, relatively clean conditions for a hostel, and a generally nice and helpful staff. But I think it’s worth sharing my experience to be informative: the linens are …

showerReviews.reviewText: I been to the down town Oakland one on a regular and this one in Berkeley is cramped. The free weights machines room is small. The cardio is all over in small rooms. The locker rooms are small too with tiny lockers. They do keep it clean and the staff is friendly.

The Berkeley YMCA offers delightfully economical gym membership and wonderful work out facilities for the whole community. It's spotless clean, the staff are friendly and always helpful and the hours are perfect. Exercise classes and workshops are offered both free and also at reasonable cost. I cant recommend this gym enough!!!

showerReviews.reviewText:
Great hostel overall - clean rooms (and the privacy curtains are a great touch!) + it's centrally located. The parking lot is a huge perk too.
The breakfast is pretty basic and there is no real kitchen (just a microwave) but otherwise it's a great place.

I absolutely loved staying here. I booked a room with balcony overlooking the street and was beautiful atmosphere of the city. Very affordable and clean. Definitely will want to come back here when looking for a place in the city! And the front desk I didn't catch her name, she was very polite and professional.

Stayed at Samesun San Francisco after my Yosemite trip and overall had a great experience. I was able to drop my bags in the luggage room before check-in, which made it easy to explore the city right away. The room was clean and …

We had a room with a private bathroom and we were very satisfied. The front desk staff were friendly and informative. The breakfast is quite good offering oatmeal, cereal, yoghurt, coffee, milk,juice. There's free parking and in the event of it being full there's free public parking 10 minutes away on foot.

I stayed in a shared room for 3 days. Room was clean. Since it is located in a quieter street, having the room opposite to the street wasn't that much of a problem. Only on the last day, there was some noise. Staff is friendly. Breakfast is …

Love the Banana ! We had so much fun here. The staff was really helpful and the place has bright colors and lots palm trees. They have secure parking, and the rooms have a private bathroom and cool kitchen, yes a full kitchen in our room, how awesome. Very affordable and excellent location, near all the hotspots in Hollywood.

For the price the rooms are clean and very nice! We had a bbq and I got to meet others from around the world! The gentleman who was in charge of the bbq was so nice and welcoming! If you go to Hollywood this is the place to go!

Great place and lots of fun. Thanks for the staff members to welcome us and host us with parties and the breakfast. And the place is nice and clean. The parking situation is very organized and they have basketball court too. And the pong table and bilyard too.

showerReviews.reviewText: It's so nice to be able to use a pool year-round. The indoor Olympic-size pool allows me to do water aerobics 5 days/week. The pool and shower facilities are well-maintained; and the instructors provide terrific workouts.

The team is amazing and the swimmers are super kind! I swim morning laps and I love being able to shower down after swimming in such a clean environment. Always a lifeguard on duty and the swimmers are happy to share their lane if it gets …

Great all year round andAF excellent facilities for taking young kids to get them ready for swim team or just to hang out. The staff is very friendly. The locker rooms and shower facilities are top-notch.
